title: Language support in the new client
body: Hey, Rito. Do you mind to allow players to play with Korean with the new client? Would you be kind enough to do that? All I want is the voice cover of the characters in Korean. With me being Korean, it allows me to dig more into the character in game, ultimately helping me do better as I get myself into this character i am playing. Plz!

replies.body:
Since you're suggesting a feature rather than looking for support with a technical issue, I recommend reposting this to the [**Miscellaneous Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) so the teams that work on language support may see it.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
